attributes.action: Enforce a General Election if a Prime Minister leaves office
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Most voters vote for an MP or a leader of a party at a general election.  It is not right for a party to change leader and therefore Prime Minister as and when they please.  The electorate should decide on a matter as important as this.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
